job_postings.title: Senior ML Engineer - Perception
job_postings.description: Build and deploy machine learning models for autonomous vehicle perception systems. Work on object detection, tracking, and sensor fusion using LiDAR, camera, and radar data.

job_postings.title: Embedded Systems Developer
job_postings.description: Develop real-time embedded software for autonomous vehicle control systems. Work with automotive-grade hardware and safety-critical software development practices.

job_postings.title: Computer Vision Researcher
job_postings.description: Conduct research on novel computer vision algorithms for autonomous driving. Publish papers, develop prototypes, and transition research into production systems.

job_postings.title: Simulation Engineer - ADAS
job_postings.description: Build high-fidelity simulation environments for testing and validating ADAS features. Create realistic scenarios for perception and planning system evaluation.
